attributes.action: stop wasting tax money employeeing people to review online petition requests.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For each of these e-petition submissions a civil servant is employed to read and understand the petition.  They then spend time deciding whether to approve it or not.  This is paid for with *YOUR* tax money.  Do you think it is a good use of your hard earned cash?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
